name: Rust Ray Tracer
description: Following Jamis Buck's excellent Ray Tracer Challenge, I wrote a CPU ray tracer with features including soft shadows, texture mapping, and constructive solid geometry.

name: Analogical Modeling Weka Plugin
description: The state-of-the-art implementation of analogical modeling, an exemplar-based machine learning algorithm. Higher-cardinality data is processed in parallel via Java's fork/join framework and Monte Carlo simulation.

name: Algorithm::AM
description: A perl library for analogical modeling, an exemplar-based machine learning algorithm. I rewrote the Perl code and modernized the C code of AM::Parallel, fixing tricky bugs and adding complete unit test coverage along the way.

name: Tree::BK
description: Perl module implementing a Burkhard-Keller, or BK tree, a structure for efficiently performing fuzzy searches in a large collection of strings.

name: LeXiTron Mac
description: A distribution of the Thai Government's LEXiTRON Thai/English dictionary for use on Macintosh computers (three-finger click, dictionary.app, etc.).

name: Soar Tokenizer
description: Soar is a general cognitive architecture for intelligent behavior. As an open source collaborator I updated the tokenizing component with a simpler API, as well as contributing bug fixes.

name: Sublime Soar Tools
description: A Sublime Text package for developing Soar code. Includes support for syntax highlighting, snippets, an unit testing with SoarUnit.
